message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Alice, my turn. I understand your point about fairness, but with inflation, waiting isn't ideal for either of us.  This offer gets us a larger share of the money while it's still worth more.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's a good deal considering the inflation, and waiting any longer will only hurt us both more.
